videos.description: Baylor's Jake Lindsey drives against TCU and gets the difficult reverse layup to fall.
videos.headline: Jake Lindsey drives the baseline for the circus layin

videos.description: Baylor's Jonathan Motley passes up the three-point opportunity and decides to take it in for the dunk.
videos.headline: Motley drives for the one-handed slam

videos.description: Motley uses great play in the post to set up a Bears layup, plus the foul.
videos.headline: Jonathan Motley gets great position down low for the bucket

videos.description: Jonathan Motley caps off a 25-point day with a strong dunk against TCU.
videos.headline: Ishmail Wainwright connects with Jonathan Motley for the alley-oop slam.

videos.description: Baylor head coach Scott Drew discusses the Bears' 70-52 win over TCU with Bryndon Manzer.
videos.headline: Scott Drew postgame interview
